General.Name: SRG Mining Inc
General.Description: SRG Mining Inc., a Canadian-based mining company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Africa. The company primarily explores for graphite deposits. It holds interests in the Lola graphite project located in the Republic of Guinea, West Africa. The company was formerly known as SRG Graphite Inc. and changed its name to SRG Mining Inc. in July 2019. SRG Mining Inc. was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1320 Graham Boulevard, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3P 3C8
